backend/main.mo: Backend actor defining user profiles, journaling entries, squad groups, reports, and authorization helpers using Motoko maps and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence document describing a UI update to normalize invite codes in onboarding.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated text summaries of major frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app with favicon and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setting up authentication-aware routing, onboarding checks, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Journal editor component handling create, edit, delete, sharing, and squad selection logic.
Authenticated app layout with navigation, mobile menu, user dropdown, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Handles invite-code onboarding and disclaimer acceptance with form steps and related mutations.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportDi: Provides a dialog for submitting abuse reports with reason selection, optional details, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/content/disclaimer.ts: Exports the static disclaimer text shown during onboarding.
frontend/src/content/modules.ts: Defines module-related interfaces and exports an array of structured training modules with content and prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and exposing login/clear functions via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, invites, disclaimers, journaling, and reports using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables inspired by a red-accent DAGGER theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReports.tsx: Displays an admin-only interface to review, sort, and update user reports with status controls.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Fetches and displays community guidelines in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Manages creation, editing, and listing of personal journal entries, including squad-shared visibility.
frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx: Shows categorized learning modules with content sections and allows starting reflections that prefill journal entries.
frontend/src/pages/PublicLanding.tsx: Public landing page describing the platform and providing Internet Identity login with disclaimer and feature overview.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsAbout.tsx: Displays user profile details, disclaimer text, and app information using data from user queries.
frontend/src/pages/Squads.tsx: Lists the user’s squads and provides dialogs to create or join squads via invite codes.
frontend/src/pages/SquadSharedEntries.ts: Shows a squad’s shared journal entries, member details, invite code actions, and leave/report workflows.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCode.ts: Trims whitespace from invite codes before use.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, plugins, and design tokens.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and system capabilities.
